verbose_text: A high Cx45 expression was associated with the altered regulation of the mitogen activated protein kinase (MAPK) pathway and the release of pro inflammatory cytokines [interleukin (IL)-17, tumor necrosis factor (TNF), interferon-gamma], whereas a low Cx45 expression was associated with the altered regulation of protein functions (i.e., ligase activity, protein folding and catabolism).
